mil3.7.10:1.3: ‘atthikani dighani yojanasatikanipi’ti, rukkhopi tava natthi yojanasatiko, kuto pana atthikani dighani yojanasatikani bhavissanti”ti?
mil3.7.10:2.1: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, sutam te ‘mahasamudde pancayojanasatikapi maccha atthi’”ti?
mil3.7.10:2.3: “Nanu, maharaja, pancayojanasatikassa macchassa atthikani dighani bhavissanti yojanasatikanipi”ti?
